What is PBCore?

Pbcore is DOPE.

Key Functions

A guideline for cataloging or describing audiovisual content (as a content standard)
A model for building custom databases/applications
A guideline for identifying a set of vocabularies for fields describing AV assets
A data model for a configurable collection management system (Omeka, Collective Access, etc.)
An exchange (import or export) mechanism between applications
A guideline for creating inventory spreadsheets

PBCore
Public Broadcasting Metadata Dictionary Project
PBCore, the Public Broadcasting Metadata Dictionary, is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. Users may share the material in any medium or format and adapt or build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially. To do so, you must give an appropriate attribution, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
